ED_Title: Document considered by the General Assembly in connection with the question of the rights
ED_DecisionText:
At its 65th plenary meeting, on 19 December 2016, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Third Committee,  took note of the note by the Secretary-General transmitting the report of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights on the status of the United Nations Voluntary Fund for Indigenous Peoples  submitted under the item entitled “Rights of indigenous peoples”.

(See A/71/481, para. 13, A/71/PV.65)
ED_Disclaimer: The text of this decision is available in all languages in document A/71/49 (Vol. II).
